EmailTemplate.subject: Breaking | Top 10 Global Compliance Trends in 2013
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Neil Baker, Compliance Week's London correspondent, predicts that "with Dodd-Frank Act rulemaking nearly complete, 2013 might be a slightly quieter year for regulatory change in the U.S. . . Not so for Europe and other global regions. Global regulators, accounting standard setters, and foreign enforcement agencies have a full pipeline of new initiatives, many of which will affect U.S. businesses. Here are 10 developments to watch on the global compliance front in the coming year."
